g.text: Roger Randriamampianina
is a Senior Scientist working at the
Norwegian Meteorological Institute. He obtained his Ph.D. in Math-
ematics and Physics in 1995. Currently, he is a member of the
HIRLAM Management Group and project leader for upper-air data
assimilation.
Address:
Norwegian Meteorological Institute, P.O. Box 43, Blindern,
0313 Oslo, Norway.
e-mail: rogerr@met.no
Michael Karcher
is a Physical Oceanographer, who received his
Ph.D. in 1994 from the University of Hamburg, Germany. He cur-
rently works as a Research Scientist at the Alfred Wegener Institute
for Polar and Marine Research and as a Director and Researcher at the
scientiﬁc company Ocean Atmosphere Systems GmbH. He acted as
the assistant coordinator for the project ACCESS. His work focuses
on numerical modeling of sea ice and ocean, and more recently also
on interdisciplinary aspects of climate change in the Arctic.
Address:
Alfred-Wegener-Institut Helmholtz-Zentrum fu
r Polar- und
Meeresforschung, Bussestrasse 24, 27570 Bremerhaven, Germany.
Address:
Ocean Atmosphere Systems GmbH, Tewessteg 4, 20249
Hamburg, Germany.
e-mail: michael@oasys-research.de; michael.karcher@awi.de
Jinlun Zhang
is a Senior Principal Oceanographer at the Polar Sci-
ence Center, Applied Physics Laboratory, University of Washington,
Seattle, USA. He is PI of various NASA, NSF, ONR, and DHS
awards, investigating the properties of polar sea ice–ocean systems by
developing and using models such as the pan-Arctic Ice-Ocean
Modeling and Assimilation System (PIOMAS).
Address:
Applied Physics Laboratory, Polar Science Center,
University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.
e-mail: zhang@apl.washington.edu
Mehrad Raﬁzadeh
is a CNRS Research Engineer in data processing
at LOCEAN. His expertise is in remote sensing and in situ data
collected from different regions of the globe and their intercompar-
isons. His recent research work is focused on poles and particularly
the comparison of ice data measured by satellites and model outputs.
Address:
University Pierre & Marie Curie, LOCEAN, 4 Place Jussieu,
75005 Paris, France.
e-mail: mehrad.raﬁzadeh@locean-ipsl.upmc.fr
The Author(s) 2017. This article is an open access publication
www.kva.se/en
